germanic.name: Germanic
germanic.description: moral subtext, punishment for stupidity/cruelty, magic, talking animals.

slavic.name: Slavic
slavic.description: heroic motifs, nature as a character, magical helpers.

caucasian.name: Caucasian
caucasian.description: courage, honor, cunning, hospitality, struggle with fate and elements.

turkic.name: Turkic
turkic.description: eastern flavor, wisdom of dervishes, humor, importance of the word.

french.name: French
french.description: miracles, magical transformations, fairies, important lessons for children.

scandinavian.name: Scandinavian
scandinavian.description: trolls, giants, nature as a character, harshness of the world, justice.

english_irish.name: English and Irish
english_irish.description: fairies, forest spirits, magical lands, moral dilemmas.

spanish_portuguese.name: Spanish and Portuguese
spanish_portuguese.description: blend of Arabic and European influence, romantic and domestic tales.

chinese.name: Chinese
chinese.description: respect for elders, natural forces, irony, morality, foundations of Tao and Confucianism.

japanese.name: Japanese
japanese.description: magical spirits, relationship with nature, honor, gratitude.

jewish.name: Jewish
jewish.description: wisdom, irony, fate and trials, ethical choice, domestic logic, humor, ethics, family values.
